markdown:
# CandiCrash React Web Client
CandiCrash is a SparkDigital project to be used for the QA candidates interviews
Right now the project is deployed at [candicrash.sparkdigital.rocks](http://candicrash.sparkdigital.rocks/) using AWS EC2 instance.
There is also a development/QA environment at [canditest.sparkdigital.rocks](http://canditest.sparkdigital.rocks/), using AWS Elastic Beanstalk

## Run the project

To run the project locally use:

```javascript
npm install && npm start
```

## Production build
### With Continuous integration
For CI there is a BitBucket pipeline setup that will be triggered automatically when merging into Master branch. This pipeline will deploy into the AWS S3 instance used for [canditest.sparkdigital.rocks](http://canditest.sparkdigital.rocks/)
To se the actual pipeline set-up see bitbucket-pipelines.yml file in the root directory
### Manual Build
For manual production build use:
```javascript
npm run build
```
This is used to manually deploy into the EC2 instance using SFTP
title: CandiCrash React Web
